wordGroup: insulin resistance 抗胰岛素性；胰岛素耐受性
insulin receptor n. 胰岛素受体

sentences.en: Insulin is secreted by the pancreas.
Insulin enables the body to use and store sugar.
sentences.cn: 胰岛素使人体能够利用和贮存糖分。

sentences.en: She has been injecting herself with insulin since the age of 16.
sentences.cn: 她从16岁起就开始自行注射胰岛素。
